title: Purchased RP and Got Charged but recieved NO RP
body: I just bought 10 dollars worth of RP and havent got any RP but my bank got charged. I want a Refund of the RP please

replies.body: As DTN suggested, our billing team can help you out by submitting a ticket.  As a safety precaution, we wouldn't want to assist with payment issues through the boards.  We'll respond to your ticket and help out as soon as possible!
Please contact Player Support through a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you out.
